item.title: Applying the Theory of Constraints to Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu
item.description: Exploring Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu through the Theory of Constraints: How physical limitations, positional control, and dynamic trade-offs shape the flow of a match. Learn how BJJ practitioners impose and relieve constraints while optimizing their endurance, strength, and flexibility
